column2: The ultimate cause of the Event which destroyed Old America is shrouded in mystery. However, there is one theory that has persisted through the ages. column2: The Society of Jesus, also known as the Jesuits, have had a presence in the Americas for over a millenium. They have once again dedicated themselves to bringing the word of God to North America, no matter the cost...\nAs a lay member of the Order, you are expected not to pursue material wealth and to assist the Jesuits whenever possible.
column3: Les Dominicains sont capables d'écouter les confessions de n'importe quel chrétien. Habillés en noir et blanc, ils mènent la sainte inquisition en identifiant les hérétiques. En tant que membre de cet ordre, il est attendu de vous de ne pas rechercher l'enrichissement matériel, mais la vérité.
column4: Die Mitglieder des Dominikanerordens sind in schwarz und weiß gekleidet und lauschen den Beichten aller Christen. Ihnen obliegt die Führung der Heiligen Inquisition, deren Aufgabe es ist, Ketzer aufzuspüren. Von Angehörigen des Ordens wird verlangt, allen materiellen Gütern abzuschwören und nach wahrer Erkenntnis zu streben.
column6: Los miembros de la orden dominicana pueden confesar a cualquier cristiano. Visten de blanco y negro, están al mando de la santa Inquisición y su misión consiste en desenmascarar a los herejes. Sus miembros deben perseguir la verdad y no acumular bienes materiales.

column2: The Inquisitors are able to listen to the confessions of any [christian.GetGroupName] – dressed in white and black, they lead the holy inquisition, charged with a mission to identify heretics. As a lay member of their Order you are expected to not pursue material wealth, but strive to be a seeker of truth.
column3: Les Inquisiteurs sont capables d'écouter les confessions de n'importe quel [christian.GetGroupName]. Habillés en noir et blanc, ils mènent la sainte inquisition en identifiant les hérétiques. En tant que membre de cet ordre, il est attendu de vous de ne pas rechercher l'enrichissement matériel, mais la vérité.
column4: Die Inquisitoren sind in schwarz und weiß gekleidet und lauschen den Beichten aller [christian.GetGroupName]en Gläubigen. Ihnen obliegt die Führung der Heiligen Inquisition, deren Aufgabe es ist, Ketzer aufzuspüren. Von Angehörigen des Ordens wird verlangt, allen materiellen Gütern abzuschwören und nach wahrer Erkenntnis zu streben.
column6: Los Inquisidores pueden confesar a cualquier [christian.GetGroupName]. Visten de blanco y negro, están al mando de la Santa Inquisición y su misión consiste en desenmascarar a los herejes. Sus miembros deben perseguir la verdad y no acumular bienes materiales.

column2: The Chabad movement originated in the Old World, but its leaders have resided in Brooklyn for centuries. The movement emphasizes the importance of wisdom, understanding, and knowledge, focusing on Torah study and prayer rather than esotericism.
The Studious Ones is an old scholar community with "Pray and Study", as their motto. They worship [jewish.GetHighGodName] and find purpose in scholarly work and debate.

column2: This character has secluded themselves to acknowledge and repent for their sins, so that they will be less likely to sin in future.
Your character will make more of an effort to fulfill the first mitzvah — to be fruitful and multiply.
Invite Chabad Rabbi
Invite a Chabad rabbi to join your court.
A Chabad Rabbi will soon appear at the court of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
Enables you to invite a learned Chasidic Rabbi to your court.
Convert County to Yiddish

[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

The hectic life of a ruler rarely allows for sufficient time for repentance. I ask of you to seclude yourself and think about the sins you have committed. Reflection is the first step to repentance, [Root.GetSocietyRank].

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
Secluded Teshuva

To become a better Jew, you are to seclude yourself to reflct and repent. Spend your days reading [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] and contemplating your sins, both past and present. During this time, you must live simply and restrict your access to the outside world.
To complete this mission, select §Y'Begin Secluded Teshuva'§! in the Intrigue Menu and successfully complete your process of redemption.
Begin Secluded Teshuva
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can seclude [Root.GetHerselfHimself] and reflect upon [Root.GetHerHis] life and [Root.GetHerHis] sins to become a better Jew.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not secluded [Root.GetHerselfHimself] to perform teshuva recently.\n
Rampant Sinner
column3: Inexorablement dans le péché
column4: Zügelloser Sünder
column6: Pecador empedernido

column2: This character simply cannot help but act shamefully. Even as they attempted to perform teshuva, they fell to sin.
Cultural Tension
This county is in a state of unrest due to Chabad's efforts to make the local populace adopt Yiddish culture.
The Chabad Rabbi has finally arrived at my court. [From.GetFirstName] is a most noble and wise rabbi and I will happily receive [From.GetHerHis] counsel in matters of religion and scholarly pursuits.
A majority of the population in [From.GetName] has embraced Yiddish culture.

A courier is brought before me with a message, telling me that [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has sent shluchim to [From.GetName] who have successfully managed to persuade the populace to embrace Yiddish culture.
Start planning the theft of the §Ancient Torah§!!
Fascinating! I shall visit the synagogue where this feat has been accomplished.

column2: Emperor's Blessings upon you

column1: ##Note: the Benedictine order is well-established as an Anglican religious order IRL. I don't think I have to touch most of their localization.##

column2: The Diligent Ones is an old monastic community with 'Ora et Labora', meaning 'pray and labor', as their motto. Often recognized by their black habits, they worship [high_church.GetHighGodName] and find purpose in prayer and quiet contemplation as well as scholarly work.
column3: Les Diligents sont une vieille communauté monastique, dont 'Ora et Labora', 'Prie et travaille', est la devise. Souvent reconnus par leurs habits noirs, ils rendent un culte au [catholic.GetHighGodName] et se consacrent à la prière et la contemplation silencieuse, aussi bien qu'aux travaux d'érudition.
column4: Der Gewissenhaften sind eine alte Mönchsgemeinschaft, die dem Motto "Ora et Labora" ("Bete und arbeite") folgt. Man erkennt die Mitglieder oft an ihren schwarzen Kutten. Sie beten zu [catholic.GetHighGodName] und machen sich das Gebet, die stille Meditation sowie gelehrsame Arbeit zum Lebenszweck.
column6: Los Diligentes son una antigua comunidad monástica cuyo lema es "Ora et labora"(reza y trabaja). Se les reconoce por sus hábitos negros. Adoran a Dios y encuentran un propósito en la oración, la contemplación silenciosa y la labor académica.

column2: The Brigham Young Society
The Pious Following
column3: Pieux Adeptes
column4: Die Frommen Anhänger
column6: Los Seguidores píos

column2: [GetBYUSocietyDesc]
column3: [GetBYUSocietyDesc]
column4: [GetBYUSocietyDesc]

column2: The Brigham Young Society grew out of the old Brigham Young University after the Event. The Brigham Young Society is now exclusively Mormon, and focused more on the Mormon faith more than secular education.

The Pious Following follows the oldest of monastic rules, set originally by the hallowed martyr. In the spirit of the deserts we value simplicity, submission and humility. It is the duty of [miaphysite.GetName] monks to work to spread the word, building on the oldest [christian.GetName] monastic tradition in the world.
column3: Les Pieux Adeptes suivent les plus anciennes règles monastiques, établies à l'origine par le martyr sanctifié. Ce qu'ils apprécient dans les esprits du désert, c'est la simplicité, la soumission et l'humilité. Il est du devoir des moines [miaphysite.GetName]s d'oeuvrer à répandre la sainte parole, en s'appuyant sur la plus ancienne tradition monastique [christian.GetName] du monde.
column4: Die frommen Anhänger folgen den ältesten Mönchsregeln, die auf den Heiligen Märtyrer zurückgehen. Im Geiste der großen Väter der ägyptischen Wüste legen wir Wert auf Schlichtheit, Gehorsam und Demut. Es ist die Pflicht der [miaphysite.GetName]en Mönche, das Wort zu verbreiten und die älteste [christian.GetName]e Mönchstradition weiterzuführen.
column6: Los Seguidores píos siguen las reglas monásticas más antiguas, establecidas por el santo mártir. En consonancia con su espíritu valoramos la sencillez, la sumisión y la humildad. El deber de los monjes [miaphysite.GetName] es trabajar para difundir la palabra, basándose en la tradición monástica [christian.GetName] más antigua del mundo.

column2: The Chancellor of the Brigham Young University.
the Bankers' Guild
The Bankers' Guild

The Bankers' Guild has existed for centuries. Originally a small organization that existed simply to train and organize private bankers, it has since grown into a continent-wide association that enforces debts and regulates investment. Although many religions look down on moneylending, it can be incredibly profitable if you have good intuition...
Manager
Board Member
Board Governor
Chief Board Governor
Manager
Board Member
Board Governor
Chief Board Governor
Shares
The Chief Officer of the Bankers' Guild.
Liquidate Shares
Sell your shares on the market in exchange for cold, hard cash.
Subsidize Construction
Use your shares to subsidize construction in your realm for half a year.
Use your shares to subsidize construction in your realm for half a year.
Invest in Research
Use your shares to massively invest in research, giving you tech points almost instantly.
Prepare for an Bankers' Guild Branch
I can use my prestige and connections within the Bankers' Guild to establish a Branch within one of my counties.
Increase Prosperity
Increase the prosperity level of this area, in exchange for a significant number of shares.
Sold Shares
This character has recently sold some of their shares.
Subsidized Construction
This character has subsidized construction in their realm.
Invested in Research
This character has recently made a massive investment to research in their realm.
Increased Prosperity
This character has recently increased prosperity in their realm.
You have successfully sold your shares at market.
It was a good time to cash out.
You have decided to invest in research in your realm, but you must still decide where exactly your investment will go.
I will invest in economic research, of course.
I will give patronage to prominent authors and artists in my realm.
We must not fall behind in military technology!
You have successfully increased the prosperity level of a county in your realm.
My realm grows ever stronger!
Pick the Business focus

You may be a banker, but you are also a ruler, and you have recently allowed your duties as a banker to languish. The Chief Officer has therefore asked you to put more of a focus on matters of business and finance.
To complete this mission, pick the §Y'Business'§! focus in the Character screen.

Hello, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

We have noticed that you are not putting an appropriate focus on matters of business and finance. You should rectify this immediately, for the good of both your personal transactions and the Union as a whole. 

Signed, Chief Officer [From.GetFirstName]

Hello, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

You have been putting more focus on matters of business and finance recently, and it certainly shows. Your standing in our Union has improved, and I am personally impressed with your dedication to our society. 

Signed, Chief Officer [From.GetFirstName]
Good! Now, where is my abacus...
Collect a Debt

Several of the Bankers' Guild's clients have failed to pay back their debts, which puts the entire society in jeopardy. The Chief Officer has asked you to collect one of these outstanding debts, using force if necessary.
To complete this mission, win a war using the §Y'Debt War'§! causus belli. Failure to win will have major consequences...

Hello, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Many of our clients have recently failed to pay back the debts they owe to the Union. As you know, failure to enforce debts could lead to the collapse of the entire Union. We would appreciate it greatly if you... enforced one of these debts.

Signed, Chief Officer [From.GetFirstName]

Hello, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

We have recently received word that you have successfully enforced an outstanding debt. Confidence in our Union has been restored, and we can now return to business as usual. Your standing in our Union has increased greatly.

Signed, Chief Officer [From.GetFirstName]
I might've had to break a few kneecaps, but it was worth it...

Hello, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

We have recently received word that you failed to enforce an outstanding debt, and that you furthermore were forced at the point of a sword to forgive that debt. This failure has been noted by the Union.

Signed, Chief Officer [From.GetFirstName]
I was made an offer that I couldn't refuse...
Build a City
The Chief Officer has requested that you build a city somewhere in your realm. This would be of great benefit to the Union, and doing this would greatly increase your standing in it.
To complete this mission, build a §Y'City'§! holding somewhere in your realm.

Hello, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

It has come to the Bankers' Guild's attention that you own large tracts of empty, unused land. If you were to build a new city somewhere in your realm, your standing in the Union would increase greatly.

Signed, Chief Officer [From.GetFirstName]

Hello, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

We have received word that a new city has been built in your realm. We have already sent minor union members there to oversee banking and trade in the area, and the Union has benefited greatly from this development. As promised, your standing in the Union has been increased.

Signed, Chief Officer [From.GetFirstName]

Hello, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

We have received your entry fee in full. Welcome to the Bankers' Guild! Your financial acumen will be put to good use in our society, and I personally look forward to a mutually beneficial partnership.=.

Signed, Chief Officer [From.GetFirstName]
So I just have to sign here and here and...
In recent days, your duties as a banker have kept you from sleeping and eating properly. You feel more and more worn-out...
I think I could use a bank holiday...

Since you have become a banker, you have found yourself becoming less and less sympathetic to the financial perils of others. Surely it is their fault for not pulling themselves up by their boostraps, as you have?
They are just lazy.
Since you have become a banker, you have found yourself becoming less content with your current lifestyle. A little more gold never hurt anyone, did it?
If I were a rich man...
Sell 100 shares.
Sell 200 shares.
Sell 400 shares.
Sell 600 shares.
Sell 800 shares.
Sell 1000 shares.
Perform Penitence
I must suffer as jesus did to cleanse myself of sin.
You join a procession through the streets of your capital that you arranged, humbling yourself through flagellation, cleansing your soul of sinfulness before all your people.
I feel the blessings of god.
Bankers' Guild House
A local branch of the Bankers' Guild banking group that can offer loans to merchants increasing the flow of wealth within your realm.

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you are in violation of this Bankers' Guild's rules. Because of this, you have been summarily expelled from the Bankers' Guild. Please refrain from seeking our services in the future. 

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column3:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Il est venu à notre attention que vous n'adhérez plus à la vraie foi. Comme la défense de la religion chiite et de ses adeptes est notre premier devoir, c'est un acte de trahison du plus haut degré. Si vous voulez rester en vie, ne croisez plus notre chemin.

Signé, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column4:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName],

wir erhielten Kenntnis davon, dass Ihr nun nicht mehr dem wahren Glauben anhängt. Als Verteidiger der Schia und aller wahrhaft Gläubigen ist es unsere höchste Pflicht, diesen Verrat zu sühnen. Sorgt dafür, dass wir uns nie wieder begegnen, wenn Euch Euer Leben lieb ist. 

Gezeichnet, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column6:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]:

Ha llegado a nuestro conocimiento que ya no sigues la fe verdadera. Dado que la defensa del chiismo y de sus seguidores es la razón de nuestra existencia y nuestro deber primordial, este constituye el más alto acto de traición. Si deseas conservar la vida, no vuelvas a cruzarte nunca en nuestro camino. 

Firmado: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

column2: Exchange up to one thousand shares for hard currency at a 2 to 1 ratio.
Use your shares to reduce the cost of construction in your realm for a year.
Use your shares to invest in research in your realm, giving you extra tech points.
I can use my prestige and connections within the Bankers' Guild to establish a Branch within one of my counties.
Use your shares to increase the prosperity level of one of your counties. (Reaper's Due only)
It was my pleasure.
\nA group of bankers have agreed to underwrite our loan. Payment will be due in five years... with interest.

Circumstances have forced you or your advisors to convert your banking capital back into regular currency. There are many loans to be called in, debts to be sold to other bankers, and sums to be added.
Every coin is accounted for.
A little loss can be expected.
None of these numbers add up!
...because of your stewardship or intelligence.\n
Because of your poor stewardship, stupidity, imprisonment, untrustworthy regent, or other circumstances a portion of the banking capital is lost.\n

With the recent passing of your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName], you are perfectly positioned to assume control of [From.GetPossPronoun] banking assets. Alternatively, you could simply cash out the business into your personal coffers.
I like money.
I'll carry on the family business.
Banking is not an option.
I'm already a banker, convert [From.GetPossPronoun] assets into gold.

Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] had significant debts at the time of [From.GetPossPronoun] death. His creditors will be displeased if you do not honor [From.GetPossPronoun] debts, but you may be able to negotiate favorable terms.
I have the money right here
I will assume the loan and pay in 5 years.
You assume a debt of 100 ducats\n
You assume a debt of 200 ducats\n
You assume a debt of 400 ducats\n
You assume a debt of 600 ducats\n
You assume a debt of 800 ducats\n
You assume a debt of 1000 ducats\n
I will pay a portion... but no more!
Their bad loan is not my problem.
Annual Banking Results
big windfall\n
long term payoff\n
wise debtor selection\n
war profiteering\n
risky returns\n
profitable fraud\n
consistent profits\n
disaster averted\n
soft hearted lending\n
timid lending\n
break even\n
war disruption\n
reckless losses\n
foolish losses\n
deadbeat borrowers\n
mad banker\n
Your banking efforts this year have reaped a huge windfall. Your coffers are full to bursting with gold pouring in from your many wisely selected debtors.
Let the good times roll!
Your clear-eyed long term planning is paying off. Your patience and diligence have generated a profit where a more fickle moneylender would have lost [Root.GetPossPronoun] shirt.
Good things come to [Root.GetSubjectPronoun] who waits.
This has been a good year for banking profits, thanks to your negotiation skills and excellent judgment concerning the character of potential debtors. No one is going to pull the wool over your eyes!

War can be a profitable time for a moneylender. You have taken advantage of certain opportunities, and instigated conflict to provide future opportunities. Some call it profiteering, but you just call it profit.
Your risky loans have paid off handsomely. This should silence any critics among your advisors who suggested that you take a more conservative approach.
Nothing ventured, nothing gained.
The world of moneylending contains sharks, like you, and the chum that you feast upon. You are the apex predator, your debtors and banking rivals exist merely to be milked of their wealth.
There's a sucker born every minute.
Your careful moneylending consistently brings in a profit. It may not be glamorous or exciting, but at least no one needs to get cheated for you to turn a profit.
Slow and steady wins the race.
A few of your big loans nearly went sour, but your quick thinking and silver tongue averted disaster. There's no replacement for hard-nosed negotiation and debt collection.
You're just not ruthless enough to make the hard moneylending decisions. Although you managed to eke out a profit, you passed up several opportunities because of the suffering they would have caused.
I am a river to my people.
Your passive lending has left much of your capital gathering dust in your vaults, and a great deal of money on the tables of potential debtors. Small profits, but at least they're low risk.
Every year has ups and downs, and this year you have ended up squarely back where you began. Breaking even wasn't your goal, but it could have been worse.
You win some, you lose some.
War can be profitable for a moneylender, but not when it arrives at your own doorstep. The current conflict has disrupted your moneylending.
War is hell.

Your poor organization and judgment have cost you a lot of money, despite your unwarranted confidence. In the uncertain case that you can find the appropriate documents, they seem to have an awful lot of red ink on them.
Am I really cut out to be a banker?
You have been on the losing end of a number of poorly thought out loans. You have trusted the wrong people, and have been outwitted by people smarter and more ruthless than yourself.
A few of your big loans went sour, and you have been unable to collect on the debt. Rather than showering you in gold, your moneylending has been draining it from your coffers.
None of these numbers add up! Someone must be stealing!
[banker_blame_horse.GetTitledFirstName]! How dare you betray me!
[banker_blame_vassal.GetTitledFirstName]! I'll have your head on a pike!
[banker_blame_family.GetTitledFirstName]! I'll have your head on a pike!
There is only one certain culprit... [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]!
I'LL DESTROY THEM ALL!
Strong Banker
This ruler waged a successful military campaign against a debtor that defaulted.
Weak Banker
This ruler is regarded as an ineffectual banker.
Debt War
$ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$-$SECOND_ADJ$ Debt War
Bankers can engage in debt wars to punish borrowers who refuse to pay their debts.
[From.GetBestName] has defaulted on [From.GetHerHis] debt, putting a portion of your loans at risk. Strong action must be taken, to set an example for other deadbeats.
Possessions are fleeting.
You can wage a punitive debt war against [From.GetTitledFirstName]\n
Forgave Debts
Banker
This character is in the business of loaning out substantial sums of gold to other rulers.
Debtor
This character owes a debt to a bank.
Become a Banker
Announce our willingness to loan out portions of our treasury to other rulers.
Stop Banking
Stop lending money to others. This will not affect any loans we have already made.
Disable Loan Requests
Ignore new requests for loans.
Enable Loan Requests
Re-enable requests for loans.
Borrow Money from Bankers
Seek a loan from a banker at 25% interest. If we fail to repay them within five years, there may be dire consequences...
Repay Bankers
Pay back the debt we owe to the bankers.
Declare Bankruptcy
Announce that we no longer intend to repay our current debts. This is a drastic decision, and our creditors will not take it lightly.
Demand Repayment from [This.GetBestName]
Lent me money

This character has earned the enmity of moneylenders everywhere by refusing to repay a loan.

[From.GetBestName] is seeking a five-year loan at 25% interest. If we pay one-fourth of the principal, other lenders will finance the rest, and we will recieve one-fourth of the principal and interest when the loan is repaid.
A fine investment
Too risky
[From.GetBestName] has agreed to underwrite our loan. Payment will be due in five years.
Excellent
We could not find any bankers willing to work with us.
Maybe next time

Recent Loan

[From.GetSheHeCap] better have the money then

Decadent Luxury
Consumerist merchants are providing a supply of luxury goods.
Consumerist Loan
Has taken a significant loan from the Consumerists.
Poor Credit
A reputation for not repaying debts.
Retired Broker
This character returned home with satchels full of gold.
Brokers Returned
Well Protected
Protected by carefully selected bodyguards.
Precious Heirloom
You made it clear your dynastic heirlooms are not for sale.
Broker arrives

A mysterious traveller has arrived at your court, requesting permission to reside there for a while. His name is [From.GetTitledFirstName], and he claims to be a wandering merchant of the Consumerist faith. He trades in luxuries and specializes in acquiring rare and unique artifacts.\n\nAfter all, who doesn't need a bit more luxury in their life?
Let him stay.
We have no need of him.
He should pay a toll for trespassing...
You will become an enemy of Consumerism\n
Grant Privileges

[From.GetTitledFirstName] claims that there is gold to be earned if you allow him special privileges in the markets of your demesne. More fine textiles, furs, spices, glassware, and Old World goods will find their way into your great hall, and the rising tide of [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] will lift all boats.\n\nOn the other hand, your vassals might be annoyed by an outsider getting special access.
I want the finer things.
I do not need such things.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has noticed that your coffers are empty, and is offering to arrange a loan for you.
Yes, I need the gold.
Usury is a sin.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] informs you that you could repay your loan now, if you choose. Alternatively, you could pay a small fee to service the loan for a while.
Remove him from my court.
I can only spare a bit of gold right now.
Here is your money in full.
I'll repay him with my firearm.
I'll repay him with my lettering machine.
I'll repay him with my Arithmometer.
I'll repay him with my pocket watch.
I'll repay him with my telescope.
I'll repay him with my collection of books.
Old Loans

Consumerist envoys arrive at your court, asking if you thought they had forgotten about a debt owed to one of their Brokers. It seems the amount you owe has risen a bit with time, and they would like it repaid immediately.
Very well, here is your gold.
Guards! Remove them from my sight.
[From.GetTitledFirstName], an infidel Consumerist merchant, has been allowed to reside within the court of your liege. You have already had several theological disputes with him.
I will complain about him to my liege.
There's nothing I can do.

[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] comes to you, complaining that the Consumerist infidel [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has no place in your court. [From.GetTitledFirstName] requests that you compel the infidel to leave.
He is useful to me.
He must find a new host.
An Impious Proposal

[From.GetTitledFirstName] speaks to you privately:\n\n"I was glad you chose to allow me to remain in your court, despite my dispute with your spiritual advisor. I think you will find that there are many advantages to following the path of [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. For a small fee, I can reveal to you the secrets to prosperity."
I will not turn from my faith.
I think we have a deal.
An Enticing Offer

[From.GetTitledFirstName] comes to you as you hold court.\n\n"My liege, I see that you are in possession of an Old World firearm. I will arrange for you to be paid a significant sum of gold for it, with which you could fund an army. Once the sale is complete, I will leave your court."
I accept your offer.
I will negotiate a better price.
This is a precious dynastic heirloom.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] comes to you as you hold court.\n\n"My liege, I see that you are in possession of an Old World lettering machine. I will arrange for you to be paid a significant sum of gold for it, with which you could fund an army. Once the sale is complete, I will leave your court."

[From.GetTitledFirstName] comes to you as you hold court.\n\n"My liege, I see that you are in possession of an Old World mechanical calculator. I will arrange for you to be paid a significant sum of gold for it, with which you could fund an army. Once the sale is complete, I will leave your court."

[From.GetTitledFirstName] comes to you as you hold court.\n\n"My liege, I see that you are in possession of an Old World pocket watch. I will arrange for you to be paid a significant sum of gold for it, with which you could fund an army. Once the sale is complete, I will leave your court."

[From.GetTitledFirstName] comes to you as you hold court.\n\n"My liege, I see that you are in possession of an Old World portable telescope. I will arrange for you to be paid a significant sum of gold for it, with which you could fund an army. Once the sale is complete, I will leave your court."

[From.GetTitledFirstName] comes to you as you hold court.\n\n"My liege, I see that you are in possession of a collection of Old World books. I will arrange for you to be paid a significant sum of gold for them, with which you could fund an army. Once the sale is complete, I will leave your court."
An Ancient Object

[From.GetTitledFirstName] comes to you as you hold court.\n\n"My liege, I have recently become aware of an Old World firearm available for you to purchase. As long as you wield it you will inspire your soldiers, terrify the enemy, and bring prestige to your dynasty. Once the sale is complete, I will leave your court."
Be silent, and take my gold!
I will negotiate a better price.
That is not a priority for me.
Very well. *Scheme to steal it*

[From.GetTitledFirstName] comes to you as you hold court.\n\n"My liege, I have recently become aware of an Old World lettering machine available for you to purchase. Anyone who reads the decrees you produce with it, with their crisp black letters, will know that you are wealthy and powerful. Once the sale is complete, I will leave your court."

[From.GetTitledFirstName] comes to you as you hold court.\n\n"My liege, I have recently become aware of an Old World mechanical calculator available for you to purchase. It will allow you to accurately tabulate the taxes and rents owed to you. Once the sale is complete, I will leave your court."

[From.GetTitledFirstName] comes to you as you hold court.\n\n"My liege, I have recently become aware of an Old World pocket watch available for you to purchase. Beyond its stylish appearance it will allow you to perfectly keep track of time, a major advantage in many situations. Once the sale is complete, I will leave your court."

[From.GetTitledFirstName] comes to you as you hold court.\n\n"My liege, I have recently become aware of an Old World far-seeing scope available for you to purchase. With it you will be able to observe enemy troop movements from far away, or gaze at the stars as our distant ancestors once did. Once the sale is complete, I will leave your court."

[From.GetTitledFirstName] comes to you as you hold court.\n\n"My liege, I have recently become aware of a collection of Old World books available for you to purchase. With a fluent scholar of Old American translating them, you will gain deep insight into medicine, engineering, and other topics. Once the sale is complete, I will leave your court."
Broker Returns
Your loyal Broker [From.GetTitledFirstName] has returned to your court with his satchels brimming with gold and silver. It is time for him to retire to a life of decadent luxury.
He has done well for our faith.
He may keep some of the spoils.
He has earned his rest.
A courier has arrived with tribute from [From.GetTitledFirstName], your loyal Broker. May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] continue to bring him prosperity.
Conspiracy!

A number of people in your employ have been discovered carrying foreign coins. Guardsmen, stablehands, and servants all with coins bearing the sign of the Dollar. There may be a Consumerist conspiracy afoot.
My wits and loyal advisers will protect me.
I need more bodyguards.
Put the traitors to the question.
Assassin!

Your crimes have not been ignored.\n\nAn assassin wearing a dark green cowl steps from the shadows, accompanied by an unfamiliar acrid scent. Before your guards can stop him, his blade flashes towards you and you must defend yourself.
Die, assassin!
En garde!
Boom, headshot!
Guards!

An hour after a hearty meal of roast chicken, you begin to feel a bit queasy and light-headed. You can barely breathe, and you clutch at your throat. Poison!\n\nCould it be that your food taster was bribed by the vile Consumerists?
Get me my court doctor!
They're all out to get me!
Lasting Damage

It has been several days since the attempt on your life, and you are suffering from vivid nightmares, hallucinations, and fatigue. Perhaps it is some kind of slow acting poison, or the handiwork of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]. You find it difficult to concentrate, and your thoughts are becoming erratic.
This is not just madness!

Those close to you are being targeted by assassins. You have just received word that your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been found dead, with the sign of the Dollar carved into [From.GetPossPronoun] forehead.
Curse them!

Those close to you are being targeted by a Consumerist assassin. You have just received word that your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been injured during an attempt on [From.GetPossPronoun] life.
Terror Beast
You ignore the opportunity to train an apprentice for §Y[GetAssassinsSocietyName]§!. The child is imprisoned for [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] crimes.\n
column3: Vous ignorez l'occasion de former un apprenti pour les Assassins. L'enfant est emprisonné[assassin_protege.GetNoneE] pour ses crimes.\n
column4: Ihr ignoriert die Möglichkeit, einen Assassinenschüler heranzuziehen. Das Kind wird für seine Verbrechen eingesperrt.\n
column6: Dejas pasar la oportunidad de entrenar a un aprendiz de los Asesinos. Encarcelan a la criatura por sus delitos.\n

column2: You ignore the opportunity to train an apprentice for [GetAssassinsSocietyName].\n
column3: Vous ignorez l'occasion de former un apprenti pour les Assassins.\n
column4: Ihr ignoriert die Möglichkeit, einen Assassinenschüler heranzuziehen.\n
column6: Dejas pasar la oportunidad de entrenar a un aprendiz de los Asesinos.\n

column2: [GetAssassinsSocietyName] will be pleased to hear of your protege, §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
column3: Les Assassins seront contents d'entendre parler de votre protégé[assassin_protege.GetNoneE], [assassin_protege.Get_le_Title]§Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
column4: Die Assassinen werden sich freuen, von Eurem Schützling §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! zu hören.\n
column6: A los Asesinos les alegrará oír acerca de tu aprendiz §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n

column2: You believe in [assassin_protege.GetHerHim]. [GetAssassinsSocietyName] will be informed of your apprentice, §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
column3: Vous croyez en [assassin_protege.GetLuiElle]. Les Assassins seront informés de votre apprenti[assassin_protege.GetNoneE], [assassin_protege.Get_le_Title]§Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
column4: Ihr glaubt an [assassin_protege.GetHerHim]. Die Assassinen werden über Eure[assassin_protege.GetnMale] Schüler[assassin_protege.GetinFemale] §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! in Kenntnis gesetzt.\n
column6: Crees en tu aprendiz. Los Asesinos recibirán noticias de tu aprendiz §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n

column2: The life of a [GetAsssassinMemberName] is not an easy one but it would seem §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! was not ready for it. [GetAssassinsSocietyName] will be informed of your failure.\n
column3: La vie d'un Assassin n'est pas facile, et il semble que [assassin_protege.Get_le_Title]§Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! n'était pas prêt[assassin_protege.GetNoneE] pour cela. Les Assassins seront informés de votre échec.\n
column4: Das Leben eines Assassinen ist kein leichtes, aber §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! war anscheinend nicht bereit dafür. Die Assassinen werden über Euer Versagen in Kenntnis gesetzt.\n
column6: La vida de un asesino no es fácil, pero parece que §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! no estaba a la altura. Los Asesinos recibirán noticias de este fracaso.\n

column2: The life of a [GetAsssassinMemberName] is not an easy one but it would seem §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! was not ready for it.\n[GetAssassinsSocietyName] will be informed of your loss.\n
column3: La vie d'un Assassin n'est pas facile, et il semble que [assassin_protege.Get_le_Title]§Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! n'était pas prêt[assassin_protege.GetNoneE] pour cela. Les Assassins seront informés de votre perte.\n
column4: Das Leben eines Assassinen ist kein leichtes, aber §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! war anscheinend nicht bereit dafür.\nDie Assassinen werden über Euren Verlust in Kenntnis gesetzt.\n
column6: La vida de un asesino no es fácil, pero parece que §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! no estaba a la altura.\nLos Asesinos recibirán noticias de tu pérdida.\n

column2: The time has come for me to confess my love for [jibenyuanze.GetHighGodName].
column3: Le moment est venu pour moi de confesser mon amour pour le seul vrai dieu.
column4: Die Zeit ist gekommen, meine Liebe für den einzig wahren Gott zu gestehen.
column6: Ha llegado el momento de confesar mi devoción por el único dios verdadero.

column2: Over the past few months, my apprentice [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] has deeply impressed both me and the state. [GetAssassinsSocietyName] have informed me that I should be proud to have been the guardian of this faithful young [assassin_protege.GetManWoman].
column3: Au cours des derniers mois, mon apprenti[assassin_protege.GetNoneE] [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] nous a particulièrement impressionnés, moi et mon ordre. Les Assassins m'ont informé que je pouvais être fi[Root.GetErEre] d'avoir été [Root.GetLeLa] tut[Root.GetEurRice] de c[From.GetEEtte] jeune fidèle.
column4: In den letzten Monaten hat [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] mich und meinen Orden tief beeindruckt. Die Assassinen haben mir gesagt, ich solle stolz sein, der Beschützer von [assassin_protege.Getdiesemdieser] treuen jungen [assassin_protege.GetManWoman] gewesen zu sein.
column6: Durante los últimos meses, mi aprendiz [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] nos ha impresionado mucho a la orden y a mí. Los Asesinos dicen que debería enorgullecerme de haber tenido bajo mi tutela a un alma tan devota.

column2: In spite of [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] injuries, my apprentice [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] has proven [assassin_protege.GetHerselfHimself], both to me and the state. [GetAssassinsSocietyName] have informed me that they are pleased with my training of the faithful young [assassin_protege.GetManWoman].
column3: En dépit de ses blessures, mon apprenti[assassin_protege.GetNoneE] [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] a fait ses preuves, à mes yeux, comme à ceux de l'ordre. Les Assassins m'ont informé qu'ils étaient satisfaits de la formation de c[From.GetEEtte] jeune fidèle.
column4: Trotz der Verletzungen hat [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] sich mir und meinem Orden bewiesen. Die Assassinen ließen mich wissen, sie wären zufrieden mit meiner Ausbildung von [assassin_protege.Getdiesemdieser] jungen [assassin_protege.GetManWoman].
column6: A pesar de sus heridas, [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] nos ha demostrado su talento a la orden y a mí. Los Asesinos están satisfechos con el entrenamiento que le he brindado.

column2: The death of my dear apprentice took me by surprise, but what is worse is the complete silence I have been met with from [GetAssassinsSocietyName]. I can only assume that they are disappointed – all I can do is wait for a new mission.
column3: La mort de m[assassin_protege.GetOnA] ch[assassin_protege.GetErEre] apprenti[assassin_protege.GetNoneE] était inattendue, mais ce qui est pire, c'est le silence absolu de la part des Assassins. Je suppose qu'ils sont déçus – tout ce que je peux faire, c'est attendre une nouvelle mission.
column4: Der Tod meines geschätzten Schülers kam überraschend, aber noch schlimmer ist das absolute Schweigen, das mir von den Assassinen entgegengebracht wird. Ich kann nur annehmen, dass sie enttäuscht sind. Alles, was ich tun kann, ist, auf eine neue Mission zu warten.
column6: La muerte de mi aprendiz me ha pillado totalmente por sorpresa. Lo peor ha sido el silencio con el que han reaccionado los Asesinos. Creo que están decepcionados. No puedo hacer otra cosa que esperar a la próxima misión.

column2: Over the past few months, my apprentice [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] has impressed both me and the state. [GetAssassinsSocietyName] have informed me that as soon as [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] has agreed to convert to our faith, they will share in my pride as guardians of this remarkable young [assassin_protege.GetManWoman].
column3: Au cours des derniers mois, mon apprenti[assassin_protege.GetNoneE] [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] nous a impressionnés, moi et mon ordre. Les Assassins m'ont informé que dès qu'[assassin_protege.GetIlElle] sera d'accord pour se convertir à notre religion, ils partageront avec moi la fierté d'avoir la tutelle de c[From.GetEEtte] jeune [assassin_protege.GetManWoman] remarquable.
column4: In den letzten Monaten hat [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] mich und meinen Orden beeindruckt. Die Assassinen ließen mich wissen, dass, sobald [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] zu unserem Glauben konvertiert, sie am Stolz als Beschützer von [assassin_protege.Getdiesemdieser] bemerkenswerten jungen [assassin_protege.GetManWoman] teilhaben werden.
column6: Durante los últimos meses, mi aprendiz [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] nos ha impresionado a la orden y a mí. Los Asesinos dicen que en cuanto acceda a convertirse a nuestra religión, celebrarán con mi mismo orgullo su trayectoria.

column2: In spite of [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] injuries, my apprentice [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] has proven [assassin_protege.GetHerselfHimself], both to me and the state. [GetAssassinsSocietyName] have informed me that as soon as [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] has agreed to convert to our faith, they will consider my mission to train the young [assassin_protege.GetManWoman] complete.
column3: En dépit de ses blessures, mon apprenti[assassin_protege.GetNoneE] [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] a fait ses preuves, à mes yeux, comme à ceux de l'ordre. Les Assassins m'ont informé que dès qu'[assassin_protege.GetIlElle] sera d'accord pour se convertir à notre religion, ils considéreront ma mission de former [assassin_protege.GetLeLa] jeune [assassin_protege.GetManWoman] comme achevée.
column4: Trotz der Verletzungen hat [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] sich mir und meinem Orden bewiesen. Die Assassinen ließen mich wissen, dass, sobald [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] zu unserem Glauben konvertiert, sie meine Mission, diese[assassin_protege.GetnMale] junge[assassin_protege.GetnMale] [assassin_protege.GetManWoman] auszubilden, als abgeschlossen erachten werden.
column6: A pesar de sus heridas, [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] nos ha demostrado su talento a la orden y a mí. Los Asesinos dicen que en cuanto acceda a convertirse a nuestra religión, darán por completado su entrenamiento.

column2: The death of my dear apprentice took me by surprise, but what is worse is the complete silence I have been met with from [GetAssassinsSocietyName]. I can only assume that they are disappointed – all I can do is wait for a new mission.
column3: La mort de m[assassin_protege.GetOnA] ch[assassin_protege.GetErEre] apprenti[assassin_protege.GetNoneE] était inattendue, mais ce qui est pire, c'est le silence absolu de la part des Assassins. Je suppose qu'ils sont déçus – tout ce que je peux faire, c'est attendre une nouvelle mission.
column4: Der Tod meines geschätzten Schülers kam überraschend, aber noch schlimmer ist das absolute Schweigen, das mir von den Assassinen entgegengebracht wird. Ich kann nur annehmen, dass sie enttäuscht sind. Alles, was ich tun kann, ist, auf eine neue Mission zu warten.
column6: La muerte de mi aprendiz ha sido totalmente imprevista. Lo peor ha sido el silencio con el que han reaccionado los Asesinos. Creo que están decepcionados. No puedo hacer otra cosa que esperar a la próxima misión.

column2: [jibenyuanze.GetHighGodName] are with us.
column3: Allah est avec nous.
column4: Allah ist mit uns.
column6: Alá está con nosotros.

column2: Praise [jibenyuanze.GetHighGodName]!
column3: Qu'Allah soit loué !
column4: Gepriesen sei Allah!
column6: ¡Alabado sea Alá!

column2: [GetAssassinsSocietyName] want nothing to do with you right now.
column3: Les Assassins ne s'intéressent nullement à vous en ce moment.
column4: Die Assassinen wollen derzeit nichts mit Euch zu tun haben.
column6: Los Asesinos no quieren saber nada de ti ahora mismo.

column2: §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! will offer [assassin_protege.GetHerselfHimself] up to [jibenyuanze.GetHighGodName] and convert to the religion of [jibenyuanze.GetName].
column3: [assassin_protege.Get_Le_Title]§Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! s'offrira à Allah et se convertira à la religion de l'islam chiite.
column4: §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! wird sich Allah hingeben und dem Schia-Islam beitreten.
column6: §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! va a consagrarse a Alá y a convertirse al chiismo.

column2: §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! will offer [assassin_protege.GetHerselfHimself] up to [jibenyuanze.GetHighGodName] and convert to the religion of [jibenyuanze.GetName].
column3: [assassin_protege.Get_Le_Title]§Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! s'offrira à Allah et se convertira à la religion de l'islam chiite.
column4: §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! wird sich Allah hingeben und dem Schia-Islam beitreten.
column6: §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! va a consagrarse a Alá y a convertirse al chiismo.

column2: §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! will offer [assassin_protege.GetHerselfHimself] up to [jibenyuanze.GetHighGodName] and convert to the religion of [jibenyuanze.GetName].
column3: [assassin_protege.Get_Le_Title]§Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! s'offrira à Allah et se convertira à la religion de l'islam chiite.
column4: §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! wird sich Allah hingeben und dem Schia-Islam beitreten.
column6: §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! va a consagrarse a Alá y a convertirse al chiismo.

column2: My child, and apprentice in the shadowy arts of assassination, has been the victim of an unexpected turn of events and a most untimely death. I could be beside myself with pain, but I must focus on recovering from the loss, while [GetAssassinsSocietyName] are informed of my predicament.
column3: Mon enfant, apprenti aux arts ténébreux de l'assassinat, a été victime d'une tournure inattendue des événements et d'une mort prématurée. La douleur me submerge, mais je dois tout faire pour me remettre de cette perte, pendant que les Assassins sont informés de ma situation difficile.
column4: Mein Kind und Schüler in den dunklen Künsten der Assassinen wurde Opfer einer unerwarteten Wendung der Ereignisse und einem frühzeitigen Tod. Ich könnte mich vor Schmerzen winden, aber ich muss mich von dem Verlust erholen, während die Assassinen über meine Lage in Kenntnis gesetzt werden.
column6: Mi aprendiz en el sombrío arte del asesinato ha sido víctima de un giro de los acontecimientos y ha sufrido una muerte prematura. No puedo sucumbir al dolor. Debo recuperarme da la pérdida mientras los Asesinos reciben noticias de mi terrible situación.

column2: My apprentice in the shadowy arts of assassination has been the victim of an unexpected turn of events and a most untimely death. [GetAssassinsSocietyName] will be informed of my loss and predicament.
column3: Mon apprenti aux arts ténébreux de l'assassinat a été victime d'une tournure des événements inattendue et d'une mort prématurée. Les Assassins seront informés de ma perte et de ma situation difficile.
column4: Mein Schüler in den dunklen Künsten der Assassinen wurde Opfer einer unerwarteten Wendung der Ereignisse und einem frühzeitigen Tod. Die Assassinen werden über meinen Verlust und meine Situation in Kenntnis gesetzt.
column6: Mi aprendiz en el sombrío arte del asesinato ha sido víctima de un giro de los acontecimientos y ha sufrido una muerte prematura. Los Asesinos recibirán noticias de la pérdida y de mi terrible situación.

column2: Borrow Money from [GetAssassinsSocietyName]
column3: Emprunter de l'argent aux Assassins
column4: Geld von den Assassinen borgen
column6: Pedir un préstamo a los Asesinos

column2: You may borrow money from the state if the Chief allows it. You are expected to pay back within a reasonable time.
column3: Vous pourriez emprunter de l'argent à l'ordre si son grand maître l'autorise. Il est attendu que vous remboursiez votre dette dans un délai raisonnable.
column4: Ihr könnt Euch Geld vom Orden leihen, wenn der Großmeister es zulässt. Ihr müsst das Geld innerhalb einer angemessenen Frist zurückzahlen.
column6: Puedes pedirle un préstamo a la orden si el gran maestre lo permite Deberás devolver el dinero en un plazo razonable de tiempo.

column2: The Chief has sufficient funds.
column3: Le grand maître a des fonds suffisants.
column4: Der Großmeister verfügt über ausreichend Mittel.
column6: El gran maestre tiene fondos suficientes.

column2: Pay Back Debt to the [GetAssassinsSocietyName]
column3: Rembourser la dette aux Assassins
column4: Schulden mit den Assassinen begleichen
column6: Devolver el dinero a los Asesinos

column2: Pay back the money you owe [GetAssassinsSocietyName].
column3: Rembourser l'argent que vous devez aux Assassins.
column4: Begleicht Eure Schulden mit den Assassinen.
column6: Salda la deuda que tienes con los Asesinos.

column2: Owes Debt to [GetAssassinsSocietyName]
column3: Doit de l'argent aux Assassins
column4: Hat Schulden bei den Assassinen
column6: Debe dinero a los Asesinos

column2: Owes money to [GetAssassinsSocietyName].
column3: Doit de l'argent aux Assassins.
column4: Schuldet den Assassinen Geld.
column6: Debe dinero a los Asesinos.

column2: Donate 300¤ to [GetAssassinsSocietyName]
column3: Donner 300¤ aux Assassins
column4: Den Assassinen 300¤ spenden
column6: Donar 300 ¤ a los Asesinos

column2:
Good morning, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Your generous gift to the State shall not be forgotten. The money will come to good use in the defense against those who threaten the true faith. 

Praise [jibenyuanze.GetRandomGodName]!
Signed, Chief [From.GetFirstName]
column3:
As-salâmu 'alaykoum [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

Votre généreux présent pour l'Ordre ne sera pas oublié. L'argent sera utilisé pour se défendre contre ceux qui menacent la vraie foi.

Qu'Allah soit loué !
Signé, Grand Maître [From.GetFirstName]
column4:
As-salamu alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Euer großzügiges Geschenk an den Orden wird nicht in Vergessenheit geraten. Das Geld wird sich für die Verteidigung gegen jene, die den wahren Glauben bedrohen, als nützlich erweisen. 

Gepriesen sei Allah!
Gezeichnet, Großmeister [From.GetFirstName]
column6:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetFirstName]:

La orden no olvidará tu generosa contribución. Este dinero será invertido para defendernos de los infieles que atentan contra la fe verdadera. 

¡Alabado sea Alá!
Firmado: Gran maestre [From.GetFirstName]

column2: Excellent.
column3: Excellent.
column4: Hervorragend.
column6: Excelente.

column2:
Good morning, [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

The time has come for you to repay your debt to the State. I trust you send me the [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] gold as soon as you receive this letter.

Praise [jibenyuanze.GetRandomGodName]!
Signed, Chief [From.GetFirstName]
column3:
As-salâmu 'alaykoum [Root.GetTitledFirstName]

Le moment est venu pour vous de rembourser votre dette à l'Ordre. J'espère que vous m'enverrez les [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] pièces d'or dès que vous recevrez cette lettre.

Qu'Allah soit loué !
Signé, Grand Maître [From.GetFirstName]
column4:
As-salamu alaykum, [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Eure Zeit ist gekommen, Eure Schulden bei dem Orden zu begleichen. Ich vertraue darauf, dass Ihr mir die [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] Goldstücke schickt, sobald Ihr diesen Brief erhaltet.

Gepriesen sei Allah!
Gezeichnet, Großmeister [From.GetFirstName]
column6:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetFirstName]:

Ha llegado el momento de que pagues la deuda que contrajiste con la orden. Confío en que enviarás los [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] de oro en cuanto recibas esta carta.

¡Alabado sea Alá!
Firmado: Gran maestre [From.GetFirstName]

column2:
Good morning, [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

The time has come for you to repay your debt to the State. If you cannot spare the [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] gold, I have another suggestion. The state is in unending need of agents and your [child_offer.GetRootRelation] [child_offer.GetFirstName] would make an excellent addition to our ranks.

Praise [jibenyuanze.GetRandomGodName]!
Signed, Chief [From.GetFirstName]
column3:
As-salâmu 'alaykoum [Root.GetTitledFirstName]

Le moment est venu pour vous de rembourser votre dette à l'Ordre. Si vous ne pouvez dépenser [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] pièces d'or, j'ai une autre suggestion. L'Ordre a un besoin sans fin de champions et votre [child_offer.GetRootRelation] [child_offer.GetFirstName] ferait une excellente recrue.

Qu'Allah soit loué !
Signé, Grand Maître [From.GetFirstName]
column4:
As-salamu alaykum, [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Eure Zeit ist gekommen, Eure Schulden bei dem Orden zu begleichen. Wenn Ihr die [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] Goldstücke nicht entbehren könnt, habe ich einen anderen Vorschlag. Der Orden sucht stets nach Neuzugängen und [child_offer.GetEuerEure] [child_offer.GetRootRelation] [child_offer.GetFirstName] wäre hervorragend für unsere Ränge geeignet.

Gepriesen sei Allah!
Gezeichnet, Großmeister [From.GetFirstName]
column6:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetFirstName]:

Ha llegado el momento de que pagues la deuda que contrajiste con la orden. Si no dispones de [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] de oro ahora mismo, te sugiero una alternativa: la orden siempre necesita paladines, y tu [child_offer.GetRootRelation] [child_offer.GetFirstName] sería una gran incorporación a nuestras filas.

¡Alabado sea Alá!
Firmado: Gran maestre [From.GetFirstName]

column2:
Good morning, [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

The time has come for you to repay your debt to the State. If you cannot spare the [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] gold, I have another suggestion. If you allow us to build a field office in [castle_offer.GetName] and aid us in its construction, your debt shall be forgotten.

Praise [jibenyuanze.GetRandomGodName]!
Signed, Chief [From.GetFirstName]
column3:
As-salâmu 'alaykoum [Root.GetTitledFirstName]

Le moment est venu pour vous de rembourser votre dette à l'Ordre. Si vous ne pouvez dépenser [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] pièces d'or, j'ai une autre suggestion. Si vous nous autorisez à bâtir un château en [castle_offer.GetName] et nous aidez à sa construction, votre dette sera effacée.

Qu'Allah soit loué !
Signé, Grand Maître [From.GetFirstName]
column4:
As-salamu alaykum, [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Eure Zeit ist gekommen, Eure Schulden bei dem Orden zu begleichen. Wenn Ihr die [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] Goldstücke nicht entbehren könnt, habe ich einen anderen Vorschlag. Wenn Ihr uns erlaubt, ein Schloss in [castle_offer.GetName] zu errichten und uns bei der Konstruktion unterstützt, ist Eure Schuld getilgt.

Gepriesen sei Allah!
Gezeichnet, Großmeister [From.GetFirstName]
column6:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetFirstName]:

Ha llegado el momento de que pagues la deuda que contrajiste con la orden. Si no dispones de [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] de oro ahora mismo, te sugiero una alternativa: Si nos permites construir un castillo en [castle_offer.GetName] y nos ayudas a construirlo, te perdonaremos la deuda.

¡Alabado sea Alá!
Firmado: Gran maestre [From.GetFirstName]

column2: [GetAssassinsSocietyName] shall have a stronghold in [castle_offer.GetName].
column3: L'Ordre aura un bastion en [castle_offer.GetName].
column4: Der Orden soll eine Festung in [castle_offer.GetName] bekommen.
column6: La orden tendrá una fortaleza en [castle_offer.GetName].

column2: Do not to pay back the money you owe. Beware – the Chief will not take your refusal lightly.\n
column3: Vous ne rendez pas l'argent que vous devez. Attention, le Grand Maître ne prendra pas votre refus à la légère.\n
column4: Zahlt das Geld, das Ihr schuldet, nicht zurück. Achtung: Der Großmeister wird Eure Absage nicht auf die leichte Schulter nehmen.\n
column6: No pagas la deuda. Cuidado: El gran maestre no aceptará un no por las buenas.\n

column2: I cannot risk the fury of [GetAssassinsSocietyName].
column3: Je ne veux pas risquer la fureur des Assassins.
column4: Ich kann es mir nicht leisten, den Zorn der Assassinen auf mich zu ziehen.
column6: No puedo arriesgarme a desatar la ira de los Asesinos.

column2: Recruit to [GetAssassinsSocietyName]
column3: Recruter pour les Assassins
column4: Für die Assassinen rekrutieren
column6: Convertir en miembro de los Asesinos

column2: Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is sympathetic to the cause of the state. If so, you may invite [Root.GetHerHim] to become a [GetAsssassinMemberName].
column3: Tenter de découvrir si [Root.Get_le_Title]§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! est bien disposé[Root.GetNoneE] à l'égard de la cause de l'ordre. Si oui, vous pourriez lui proposer de rejoindre les Assassins.
column4: Findet heraus, ob §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! der Sache des Ordens wohlgesonnen ist. In dem Fall könnt Ihr [Root.GetHerHim] einladen, ein Assassine zu werden.
column6: Averigua si §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! es afín a la causa de la orden y, en caso afirmativo, sugiérele que una a los Asesinos.

column2: Has not been approached by [GetAssassinsSocietyName] previously.
column3: N'a pas déjà été approché par les Assassins.
column4: Wurde noch nicht von den Assassinen angesprochen.
column6: Nunca ha tenido contacto con los Asesinos.

column2: Most guests have departed and evening has turned into early morning, yet [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] and I are still deep in conversation. We are talking about religion, righteousness, how to do the right thing. [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName] suggests that voting in elections must surely bring mortals closer to the divine.
column3: La plupart des invités sont partis, il va bientôt faire jour, et pourtant, vous êtes en pleine discussion avec [assassins_recruiter.Get_le_Title][assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]. Vous parlez de religion et de droiture. [assassins_recruiter.GetIlElleCap] suggère que l'aumône et le jeûne doivent assurément rapprocher les mortels du divin.
column4: Die meisten Gäste haben sich verabschiedet und der Abend ist dem frühen Morgen gewichen, doch Ihr und [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] befindet euch immer noch tief im Gespräch. Ihr redet über Religion, Rechtschaffenheit, wie man das Richtige macht. [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName] meint, das Spenden von Almosen und Fasten würde Sterbliche sicherlich dem Göttlichen näherbringen.
column6: La mayoría de los invitados se marchó y ya se había hecho de día, pero [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] y tú seguíais manteniendo una profunda conversación. Cuando salieron a relucir temas como la religión, la rectitud, cómo hacer el bien, [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName] argumentó que dar limosnas y ayunar acercan a los mortales a la divinidad.

column2: Most guests have departed and evening has turned into early morning, yet I [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] and are still deep in conversation. We are discussing a text [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName] just read. [assassins_recruiter.GetSheHeCap] suggests that its narrator might be unreliable and asks if the [jibenyuanze.GetScriptureName] is not preferable.
column3: La plupart des invités sont partis, il va bientôt faire jour, et pourtant, vous êtes en pleine discussion avec [assassins_recruiter.Get_le_Title][assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]. Vous parlez d'un hadith que [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName] vient de lire. [assassins_recruiter.GetIlElleCap] suggère que son narrateur, Abou Hourayra, pourrait être peu fiable, et demande si les hadiths notés par Ali ne seraient pas préférables.
column4: Die meisten Gäste haben sich verabschiedet und der Abend ist dem frühen Morgen gewichen, doch Ihr und [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] befindet euch immer noch tief im Gespräch. Ihr besprecht eine der Hadithen, die [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName] vor kurzem las. [assassins_recruiter.GetSheHeCap] meint, ihr Urheber, Abu Hurairah, sei nicht verlässlich, und fragt, ob die Hadithen nach Ali nicht vorzuziehen wären.
column6: La mayoría de los invitados se marchó y ya se había hecho de día, pero [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] y tú seguíais manteniendo una profunda conversación. Debatíais acerca de un hadiz que [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName] acababa de leer. Creía que el narrador, Abu Hurairah, podría no ser fiable y te preguntó si no prefieres los hadices de Alí.

column2: Those are noble actions, indeed.
column3: Ce sont en effet de nobles actions.
column4: Dies sind in der Tat noble Handlungen.
column6: Son acciones nobles, sin duda.

column2: Perhaps you are right. I tend to find more value in [jibenyuanze.GetHighGodName]'s words.
column3: C'est possible. Je vais prêter plus d'attention aux mots d'Ali.
column4: Vielleicht habt Ihr recht. Ich finde Alis Worte meist ansprechender.
column6: Es probable que tenga razón. Suelen parecerme más valiosas las palabras de Alí.

column2: Like the infidels? Never!
column3: Comme les infidèles musulmans ? Jamais !
column4: Wie die muslimischen Ungläubigen? Niemals!
column6: ¿Como los infieles musulmanes? ¡Jamás!

column2: [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName], you sound like a mindless [jibenyuanze.GetName]!
column3: [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName], vous ressemblez à un[assassins_recruiter.GetNoneE] chiite irraisonné[assassins_recruiter.GetNoneE] !
column4: [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName], Ihr klingt wie ein stumpfsinniger Schiit!
column6: ¡[assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName], hablas como esos chiíes insensatos!

column2: I approached [From.GetTitledFirstName] during a feast last night, intending to figure out whether [From.GetSheHe] might be persuaded to convert to the true faith. We had a long, deep conversation and it seems like [From.GetFirstName] is of sound opinions!
column3: Vous avez abordé [From.Get_le_Title][From.GetTitledFirstName] durant une fête, tentant de savoir [From.GetSilSielle] pourrait être persuadé[From.GetNoneE] de se convertir à la vraie foi. Vous avez eu une longue et intense discussion et il semble que [From.GetFirstName] soit ouvert[From.GetNoneE] sur le sujet !
column4: Letzte Nacht habt Ihr Euch [From.GetTitledFirstName] während eines Abendmahls genähert, da Ihr wissen wolltet, ob [From.GetSheHe] überzeugt werden könnte, zum wahren Glauben zu konvertieren. Ihr beide führtet eine lange, tiefe Unterhaltung und [From.GetFirstName] verfügt anscheinend über fundierte Meinungen!
column6: Anoche abordaste a [From.GetTitledFirstName] durante el festín para tratar de averiguar si se convertiría a la verdadera fe. Mantuvisteis una conversación larga e intensa. [From.GetFirstName] es una persona de ideales firmes.

column2: Last night I approached [From.GetTitledFirstName] during a feast, intending to figure out whether [From.GetSheHe] might be persuaded to convert to the true faith. Unfortunately, as soon I steered the conversation towards the topics of the [jibenyuanze.GetHighGodName], the narrow-minded [From.GetManWoman] became quite disagreeable...
column3: La nuit dernière, vous avez approché [From.Get_le_Title][From.GetTitledFirstName] lors d'une fête, essayant de savoir [From.GetSilSielle] pourrait être persuadé[From.GetNoneE] de se convertir à la vraie foi. Malheureusement, dès que vous avez abordé le sujet du Prophète et de son héritier légitime Ali, c[From.GetEtEtte] [From.GetManWoman] à l'esprit étroit est devenu[From.GetNoneE] désagréable...
column4: Letzte Nacht habt Ihr Euch [From.GetTitledFirstName] während eines Abendmahls genähert, da Ihr wissen wolltet, ob [From.GetSheHe] überzeugt werden könnte, zum wahren Glauben überzutreten. Leider wurde [From.Getderdie] engstirnige [From.GetManWoman] ziemlich ungehalten, als Ihr das Gespräch auf den Propheten und seinen rechtmäßigen Erben, Ali, lenktet ...
column6: Anoche abordaste a [From.GetTitledFirstName] durante el festín para tratar de averiguar si se convertiría a la verdadera fe. Por desgracia, en cuanto dirigiste la conversación hacia el tema del profeta y su legítimo heredero Alí, se puso desagradable y demostró un talante intransigente.

column2: Continue in your attempt to recruit §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to [GetAssassinsSocietyName].
column3: Continuer de tenter de recruter [From.Get_le_Title]§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! pour les Assassins.
column4: Setzt Euren Versuch fort, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! für die Assassinen zu rekrutieren.
column6: Sigues tratando de convertir a §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! en miembro de los Asesinos.

column2: End your attempt to recruit §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to [GetAssassinsSocietyName].
column3: Je mets fin à ma tentative de recruter [From.Get_le_Title]§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! pour les Assassins.
column4: Beendet Euren Versuch, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! für die Assassinen zu rekrutieren.
column6: Dejas de tratar de convertir a §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! en miembro de los Asesinos.

column2: Since I had such a good time a few weeks back, I invited [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] to share an informal meal. Yet again the conversation found its way to the topic of religion and righteousness. [assassins_recruiter.GetSheHeCap] expressed [assassins_recruiter.GetHerHis] admiration for those willing to give their life fighting for their country.
column3: Puisque vous avez passé un moment agréable quelques semaines plus tôt, vous avez invité [assassins_recruiter.Get_le_Title][assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] à partager un repas sans cérémonie. Pourtant, la conversation a porté sur le sujet de la religion et de la vertu. [assassins_recruiter.GetIlElleCap] a exprimé son admiration envers ceux qui sont prêts à donner leur vie pour défendre leurs croyances.
column4: Da ihr vor einigen Wochen eine so gute Zeit verbracht habt, habt Ihr [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] zu einem informellen Mahl geladen. Wieder wendet sich das Gesprächsthema der Religion und Rechtschaffenheit zu. [assassins_recruiter.GetSheHeCap] brachte [assassins_recruiter.GetHerHis]e Bewunderung für jene zum Ausdruck, die ihr Leben im Kampf für ihren Glauben lassen.
column6: Como lo pasasteis tan bien hace unas semanas, has vuelto a invitar a [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] para un almuerzo informal. De nuevo la conversación ha vuelto a derivar en el tema de la religión y la rectitud. [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] ha expresado su admiración por quienes están dispuestos a dar la vida luchando por sus ideales.

column2: Most guests have departed and evening has turned into early morning, yet [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] and I are still deep in conversation. We are talking about religion, righteousness, how to do the right thing. [assassins_recruiter.GetSheHeCap] expresses [assassins_recruiter.GetHerHis] admiration for those willing to give their life fighting for their country.
column3: La plupart des invités sont partis, il va bientôt faire jour, et pourtant, vous êtes en pleine discussion avec [assassins_recruiter.Get_le_Title][assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]. Vous parlez de religion et de droiture. [assassins_recruiter.GetIlElleCap] exprime son admiration envers ceux qui sont prêts à donner leur vie pour défendre leurs croyances.
column4: Die meisten Gäste haben sich verabschiedet und der Abend ist dem frühen Morgen gewichen, doch Ihr und [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] befindet euch immer noch tief im Gespräch. Ihr sprecht über Religion, Rechtschaffenheit, wie man das Richtige macht. [assassins_recruiter.GetSheHeCap] brachte [assassins_recruiter.GetHerHis]e Bewunderung für jene zum Ausdruck, die ihr Leben im Kampf für ihren Glauben lassen.
column6: La mayoría de los invitados se marchó y ya se había hecho de día, pero [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] y tú seguíais manteniendo una profunda conversación. Cuando salieron a relucir temas como la religión, la rectitud, cómo hacer el bien, [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] expresó su admiración por quienes están dispuestos a dar la vida luchando por sus ideales.

column2: I was just about to draft an invitation when [From.GetTitledFirstName] invited me to dine with [From.GetHerHim]. We talked for many hours, even as the plates were emptied and the cups drained. As I praised those willing to die for their country, [From.GetFirstName] agreed wholeheartedly, wishing [From.GetSheHe] could be more like them.
column3: Vous étiez sur le point de rédiger une invitation lorsque [From.Get_le_Title][From.GetTitledFirstName] vous a invité à dîner avec [From.GetLuiElle]. La conversation allait rust_cultist train pendant que les assiettes et les coupes se vidaient. Alors que vous faisiez l'éloge de ceux prêts à mourir pour leur foi, [From.GetFirstName] acquiesçait sans réserve, souhaitant même pouvoir plus leur ressembler.
column4: Ihr wart gerade dabei, eine Einladung zu schreiben, als [From.GetTitledFirstName] Euch zu einem Abendmahl bei sich einlud. Ihr habt stundenlang miteinander geredet, selbst als die Teller und Becher bereits leer waren. Als Ihr jene preist, die willens sind, für ihren Glauben zu sterben, stimmte [From.GetFirstName] Euch vollkommen zu und wünschte, [From.GetSheHe] könnte mehr wie sie sein.
column6: Estabas a punto de redactar una invitación cuando [From.GetTitledFirstName] te ha invitado a una cena. Habéis conversado durante horas mientras los platos y las copas se vaciaban. Cuando has alabado a quienes están dispuestos a morir por la fe, [From.GetFirstName] ha asentido con vehemencia y ha afirmado que le gustaría ser como ellos.

column2: I was just about to draft an invitation when [From.GetTitledFirstName] invited you to dine with [From.GetHerHim]. The conversation flowed easily and [From.GetFirstName] expressed many admirable sentiments. However, when I mentioned those willing to die for their country, [From.GetSheHe] sneered and condemned "such fanatics".
column3: Vous étiez sur le point de rédiger une invitation lorsque [From.Get_le_Title][From.GetTitledFirstName] vous a invité à dîner avec [From.GetLuiElle]. La conversation allait rust_cultist train et [From.GetFirstName] a exprimé de nombreux sentiments louables. Cependant, quand vous avez mentionné les personnes prêtes à mourir pour leurs croyances, [From.GetIlElle] a ricané et condamné de tels « fanatiques ».
column4: Ihr wart gerade dabei, eine Einladung zu schreiben, als [From.GetTitledFirstName] Euch zu einem Abendmahl bei sich einlud. Die Unterhaltung verlief fast wie von selbst und [From.GetFirstName] äußerte viele bewundernswerte Gedanken. Als Ihr jedoch jene erwähntet, die willens sind, für ihren Glauben zu sterben, lächelte [From.GetSheHe] höhnisch und verurteilte "diese Fanatiker".
column6: Estabas a punto de redactar una invitación cuando [From.GetTitledFirstName] te ha invitado a una cena. La conversación ha fluido de forma dinámica y [From.GetFirstName] ha expresado ideas admirables, pero cuando has hablado de quienes están dispuestos a morir por sus ideas, tu acompañante ha hecho una mueca y los ha acusado de "fanáticos"."

column2: Invite §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to join [GetAssassinsSocietyName].
column3: Proposer [From.Get_au_Title]§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! de rejoindre les Assassins.
column4: Ladet §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! ein, sich den Assassinen anzuschließen.
column6: Invitas a §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! a unirse a los Asesinos.

column2: We are quiet for a moment, both seemingly contemplating these devoted souls. Then [From.GetFirstName] looks up at me, a curious intensity in [From.GetHerHis] gaze. "That is not an impossible wish, [Root.GetFirstName]. Are you ready to kill and, if They will it, get killed to defend the words of [jibenyuanze.GetHighGodName]?"
column3: Il y a eu un moment de silence dans la conversation, apparemment parce que vous pensiez tous deux à ces âmes dévouées. Puis, [From.GetFirstName] lève les yeux vers vous, et vous fixe intensément. « Ce n'est pas un souhait irréalisable, [Root.GetFirstName]. Êtes-vous prêt[Root.GetNoneE] à tuer et, si Dieu le veut, à être tué[Root.GetNoneE] pour défendre la parole du Prophète et de l'héritier légitime ? »
column4: Ihr bliebt einen Moment still, beide offenbar jenen aufopfernden Seelen gedenkend. Dann sah [From.GetFirstName] mit einem wissbegierigen Blick zu Euch auf. "Das ist kein unmöglicher Wunsch, [Root.GetFirstName]. Seid Ihr bereit zu töten und, wenn er es wünscht, im Dienste der Worte seines Propheten und rechtmäßigen Erben getötet zu werden?"
column6: Os habéis quedado en silencio mientras admirabais el valor de los mártires. Entonces [From.GetFirstName] te ha mirado con una extraña intensidad y ha dicho: "Lo que planteas no es un deseo imposible, [Root.GetFirstName]. ¿Matarías y, si Alá lo requiere, morirías por las palabras del profeta y de su legítimo heredero?"."

column2: Write a letter to the state about §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! induction. [assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank] §Y[assassins_inductor.GetFirstName]§! will handle it from here.
column3: Vous écrivez une lettre à l'ordre au sujet de l'incorporation [From.Get_du_Title]§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!. [assassins_inductor.Get_Le_SocietyRank][assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank] §Y[assassins_inductor.GetFirstName]§! prendra le relais dorénavant.
column4: Schreibt einen Brief an den Orden über die Aufnahme von §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!. [assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank] §Y[assassins_inductor.GetFirstName]§! wird sich um alles Weitere kümmern.
column6: Escribe una carta a la orden sobre la iniciación de §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!. §Y[assassins_inductor.GetFirstName]§! se hará cargo de todo.

column2: I do, [Root.GetFirstName], says [From.GetTitledFirstName] with a solemn, almost ceremonial, voice. "There is an State devoted to [jibenyuanze.GetHighGodName]. One that defends those true of faith and brings vengeance to their persecutors. [GetAssassinsSocietyName] are always in need of champions. Think it over, and someone might reach out..."
column3: « D'accord, [Root.GetFirstName] », dit [From.Get_le_Title][From.GetTitledFirstName] avec une voix solennelle, presque cérémonielle. « Il y a un ordre, consacré à Allah et au Calife légitime, qui défend les vrais croyants et qui les venge contre leurs persécuteurs. Les Assassins ont toujours besoin de champions. Pensez-y sérieusement, et quelqu'un pourrait vous contacter... »
column4: Das tue ich, [Root.GetFirstName], sagte [From.GetTitledFirstName] mit einer fast feierlichen Stimme. "Es gibt einen Orden, der Allah und dem rechtmäßigen Kalifen dient. Ein Orden, der jene schützt, die dem wahren Glauben folgen, und der gegen ihre Verfolger Rache übt. Die Assassinen sind immer auf der Suche nach neuen Mitgliedern. Denkt darüber nach und jemand wird Euch vielleicht kontaktieren ..."
column6: Te lo prometo, [Root.GetFirstName], ha dicho [From.GetTitledFirstName] con un tono solemne, casi ceremonial. "Existe una orden consagrada a Alá y al legítimo califa. Su misión consiste en defender a los fieles y vengarse de quienes los persiguen. Se hacen llamar los Asesinos y siempre están en busca de paladines. Piénsatelo y, si te interesa, alguien se pondrá en contacto contigo"."

column2: Me, a [GetAsssassinMemberName]? Perhaps this is my destiny...
column3: Moi, un Assassin ? Peut-être que c'est mon destin...
column4: Ich, ein Assassine? Vielleicht ist das mein Schicksal.
column6: ¿Unirme a los Asesinos? Tal vez ese sea mi destino...

column2: My eyes open, seeing only darkness. For a moment, my mind is blank, before the first thoughts get through the haze of sleep. Why did I wake up? A deep [Root.GetManWoman]'s voice cuts through the silence, startling me. "The time has come for you to profess your devoutness to [jibenyuanze.GetHighGodName]."
column3: Vous ouvrez vos yeux, et ne voyez que l'obscurité. Votre esprit est vide, avant que les premières pensées n'arrivent à traverser la brume du sommeil. « Pourquoi vous êtes-vous réveillé[Root.GetNoneE] ? », dit une voix [Root.GetDDe][Root.GetManWoman], rompant le silence et vous faisant sursauter. « C'est le moment pour vous de professer votre dévotion à Allah et à l'imam légitime Ali ».
column4: Ihr öffnet Eure Augen und seht nur Finsternis. Einen Augenblick lang ist Euer Kopf leer, bevor die ersten Gedanken durch den Nebel des Schlafes dringen. Warum seid Ihr aufgewacht? Eine tiefe Stimme schneidet durch die Stille und Ihr schreckt auf. "Die Zeit ist gekommen, deine Hingabe zu Allah und dem rechtmäßigen Imam Ali zu bekennen."
column6: Tenías los ojos abiertos y solo veías tinieblas. Por un momento, tu mente se ha quedado en blanco, hasta que han brotado los primeros pensamientos entre la bruma del sueño. ¿Qué te ha despertado? Una voz grave ha atravesado el silencio y te ha sobresaltado. "Ha llegado el momento de que profeses tu devoción a Alá y al legítimo imán Alí"."

column2: Praise [jibenyuanze.GetHighGodName]! Glory to [jibenyuanze.GetRandomGodName]!
column3: Allahou akbar ! Gloire à Ali !
column4: Allahu Akbar! Gelobt sei Ali!
column6: ¡Allahu Akbar! ¡Gloria a Alí!

column2: Declare your devoutness to [jibenyuanze.GetHighGodName].
column3: Vous déclarez votre dévotion à Allah et Ali.
column4: Schwört Eure Hingabe zu Allah und Ali.
column6: Declaras tu devoción por Alá y por Alí.

column2: I will shout their names from the rooftops! Praise [jibenyuanze.GetHighGodName]!
column3: Je vais crier leurs noms depuis le toit !
column4: Ich werde ihre Namen von allen Dächern rufen! Allahu Akbar!
column6: ¡Voy a proclamar su nombre a pleno pulmón! ¡Allahu Akbar!

column2: Openly convert to §Y[jibenyuanze.GetName]§!.\n
column3: Vous vous convertissez officiellement à l'islam chiite.\n
column4: Konvertiert offen zum Schia-Islam.\n
column6: Te conviertes públicamente al chiismo.\n

column2: I will carry out [jibenyuanze.GetHighGodName]'s wishes in secret, no matter the risk.
column3: Je vais appliquer les préceptes d'Allah en secret, peu importe le risque.
column4: Ich werde Allahs Wünsche im Geheimen ausführen, egal, wie riskant es ist.
